snippet: A former bank vice president said he helped former executives of Olympus as they misrepresented the company’s financial condition.
abstract: Former Olympus vice president Chan Ming Fon pleads guilty to fraud charge; says he helped former executives of bank as they misrepresented the company’s financial condition.
lead_paragraph: A former bank vice president said he helped former executives of Olympus as they misrepresented the company’s financial condition.

headline.main: Former Banker Pleads Guilty in Olympus Accounting Case
headline.print_headline: Former Banker Pleads Guilty In Olympus Accounting Case
